TextView.android:text: Expense Manager is an app to manage your expenses.This app is created as a training course project.This app provides you to update all your credits and debits along with the details of the money transacted.One features is that we can set and change our details.As a protection feature we can set a PIN.We can also see our previous transactions along with details.A notification feature is present which notifies user when total amount is below certain amount.If the user Logouts then all previous data will be cleared .
